title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Tesla’s stock should be bought now, says analyst. This is who should be buying it and why.
items.description: Tesla shares have lost more than half their value in a span of just three months, and Cantor Fitzgerald now believes there’s 80% upside.

items.title: Discount retailer Ollie’s adds Big Lots stores, as a luxury-goods seller retreats from malls
items.description: Retailers have responded to a long period of inflation with a renewed emphasis on value over less-essential products, such as diamond rings.

items.title: General Mills sees slump in snack sales as customers focus on essentials
items.description: The company said that organic net sales “finished below our expectations.”

items.title: Treasury yields steady ahead of Fed decision
items.description: Yields on U.S. government debt moved slightly higher Wednesday morning as traders awaited a monetary policy update from the Federal Reserve.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
